LanguageData.SolarFlare.label: solar flare
LanguageData.SolarFlare.description: A solar flare is hitting the planet. This creates extreme electrical interference and prevents most electrical devices from working.
LanguageData.Eclipse.label: formørkelse
LanguageData.Eclipse.description: An eclipse is shadowing the surface. Det vil være mørkt - også i dagstimerne.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.label: psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.description: A distant, powerful AI is emitting waves of psychic force that are driving people towards insanity.
LanguageData.PsychicSoothe.label: psychic soothe
LanguageData.PsychicSoothe.description: A distant, powerful AI is emitting waves of psychic force that are calming people and stabilizing their minds.
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.label: giftigt nedfald
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.description: A plume of toxic dust from some distant source is slowly settling over this entire region of the planet. Anyone not under a roof will be slowly poisoned.
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.endMessage: Det værste af det giftige nedfald har lagt sig.
LanguageData.VolcanicWinter.label: vulkanisk vinter
LanguageData.VolcanicWinter.description: The atmosphere is choked with volcanic particles, significantly reducing the amount of light which reaches the surface. Temperatures will be colder and plants will grow slower.
LanguageData.VolcanicWinter.endMessage: Det meste af det vulkaniske aske har lagt sig.
LanguageData.HeatWave.label: hedebølge
LanguageData.HeatWave.description: An extreme wave of heat is baking the area.
LanguageData.ColdSnap.label: cold snap
LanguageData.ColdSnap.description: An unusual cold snap is freezing the region.
LanguageData.Flashstorm.label: lynstorm
LanguageData.Flashstorm.description: En voldsom mængde af lyn slår ned i en lille del af regionen.
LanguageData.ClimateCycle.label: climate cycle
LanguageData.ClimateCycle.description: A multi-year climate cycle due to an elliptical orbit.
LanguageData.Planetkiller.label: planetkiller
LanguageData.Planetkiller.description: An interstellar planetkiller weapon is approaching this planet. When it hits, it will destroy all life.
LanguageData.Aurora.label: polarlys
LanguageData.Aurora.description: Himlen er oplyst af polarlys. Dette spektakulære lysshow vil øge humøret for alle dem der er udenfor og ser det.
